channel.title: Mentorship on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents
channel.description: Recent content in Mentorship on iFetch | MultiModal Conversational Agents

item.title: Call for Mentees - Mentorship Program on Conversational Agents @ VISUM 2022
item.description: Earlier this month, we have announced the collaboration with VISUM Summer School in a new Mentorship Program initiative (see our post here). Today we bring you more updates on this initiative.

item.title: VISUM 2022 - Mentorship Program (Opportunity to learn how to build multimodal conversational agents)
item.description: We are thrilled to announce that we will work with VISUM 2022 on a new Mentorship Program initiative. It will be an inspiring opportunity for young researchers to get feedback from senior scholars and industrial researchers in Machine Learning and Computer Vision.
